title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Correct answer: No, the graph does not indicate that the process which takes the gas from state A to B is a constant temperature process.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Consistency can be shown by using specific values for A and B noted in part (a), or reasoning from other values used in part (a) (e.g. A is greater than point X that I used, and B is less than point Y; my values in part (a) show that temperature decreases from A to B)
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria.
